questions.quote: Ok, thanks. Come on in for a second.  This is my brother, Ricky. He's home from college for the weekend.
Are you kidding? That's very significant! If he was interested in me, he'd want my germs! He'd just crave my germs!
Hey. Hey, this is for you.  It's from.. uh, Susan's roommate, Sally.
You see Elaine, Billy was a simple country boy. You might say a cockeyed optimist, who got himself mixed up in the high stakes game of world diplomacy and international intrigue.
I have to dribble, if I give it to you, you just shoot. You're a chucker.
What about Saturday nights? Do you have to ask her out, or is a date implied?
Jerry, you wouldn't believe what it's like down there. Taxicab drivers are insane. You know, everybody is in a hurry.
It is the forced socializing. I mean, just because we work in the same office, why do we have to act like we're friends?
Oh, I get it. Why waste time making small talk with the doorman? I should just shut up and do my job, opening the door for you.
In the dark room? Uh no, no thank you. Not right now. I'm a day person!... Are you all right?
